subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: A lot of pro golfers are paid to use their equipment. So it’s worth noting a recent trend on the Champions Tour, where the most popular putter is made by one of the smaller companies, Rife Putters.
snippet: A lot of pro golfers are paid to use their equipment. So it’s worth noting a recent trend on the Champions Tour, where the most popular putter is made by one of the smaller companies, Rife Putters.
